Photo: << 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 >> All
Price: $309,000 Loan Payment: $1,076/mo Bedrooms: 3 Bathrooms: 3 Size: - $/Sqft: -/sqft Type: Single Family House Year Built: 1994 Lot Size: 13,421 Days on Movoto: 415 days Neighborhood: Bridgewater MLS#: P4616503 Status: Active Go See This Home Make an Offer Timeless design is evident with this exceptional pool home in established family community. Circular driveway and grand entrance opens to this spacious 3 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms (2,534 sf), floor plan with formal dining room, large family room and office.Features include: Elegant designer decorated interior, beautiful hardwood flooring, fireplace in family room, French doors, crown molding, window shutters, high ceilings, upgraded light fixtures and fans, breakfast bar in kitchen and closet pantry. Breakfast nook overlooking pool. Master suite offers plush carpeting, tray ceiling, garden tub, separate shower and twin vanities with recess lighting. Attractive screened pool with lanai, outdoor fans, surrounded by tropical landscaping. Schedule a Viewing of 5 Bridgewater Dr, Winter Haven
